name: The Mall Game
description:
This project is an accumulation of all of the work done on the Rise of the Kiosk Kid game which took place between 2017 and 2019. 

It is proof that we were there and we tried.

Controls: 

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Mouse to look

Left click to talk or grab item

Right click to zoom

Backspace to restart the scene

Escape to quit

Credits:

Fisher Wagg - Lead Design, Narrative, Programming, Level Design*, Project Lead

Scott Ethington - Systems Design*, Lead Programming*, Environment Art

Abby Pearl - Character Design, Art, Promotional Art*

Simon Wagg - Programming, 3D Modelling, Graphic Design, Level Design, Sound Design

Will Foley - Level Design*

* = not featured in this build
